about_the_game:
Egg boy is a parkour combat game based on the cartoon style , including both single-player and multiplayer modes.

Egg boy is a challenging game with casual shooter elements, and the game is unique, where players will take on the role of Eggboy and fight alone through levels such as a single-plank bridge, a hovering island, and a rabbit paradise.

In terms of the visual experience of the game, there are balls that will lose blood at any time, a combination of blocks with their own characteristics, and the ultimate big easter egg, with natural colors and eye-catching.

Ke Meng's characters and cute picture style, whether it is the character's modeling design or the overall game screen, can be described by the word "cute".

Our Egboy is very interesting, not only does he jump very high, but he also has a characteristic nose and is able to fire multiple bullets.

Our opponent is a very cute rabbit that will give the player a lot of strange challenges, and the rabbit's weapon is a very characteristic carrot, which, when thrown, can eliminate obstacles to progress.

Simple operation, extremely easy to use, move freely around the field, rush to the finish line, be careful with your step, don't fall, or you will face danger!

Dodge your opponent's attacks in the rampage levels, look for opportunities to pass the levels, find Eger, the representative of victory, and survive until the end!

Egg boy is a parkour combat game based on the cartoon style , including both single-player and multiplayer modes.

Egg boy is a challenging game with casual shooter elements, and the game is unique, where players will take on the role of Eggboy and fight alone through levels such as a single-plank bridge, a hovering island, and a rabbit paradise.

In terms of the visual experience of the game, there are balls that will lose blood at any time, a combination of blocks with their own characteristics, and the ultimate big easter egg, with natural colors and eye-catching.

Ke Meng's characters and cute picture style, whether it is the character's modeling design or the overall game screen, can be described by the word "cute".

Our Egboy is very interesting, not only does he jump very high, but he also has a characteristic nose and is able to fire multiple bullets.

Our opponent is a very cute rabbit that will give the player a lot of strange challenges, and the rabbit's weapon is a very characteristic carrot, which, when thrown, can eliminate obstacles to progress.

Simple operation, extremely easy to use, move freely around the field, rush to the finish line, be careful with your step, don't fall, or you will face danger!

Dodge your opponent's attacks in the rampage levels, look for opportunities to pass the levels, find Eger, the representative of victory, and survive until the end!
name: eggboy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i5/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i5/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "EGG BOY" is a cute cartoon-style parkour casual shooting game with very cute images and unique level design. It will be launched on Xbox at the same time, including multiplayer battle mode.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean, Uzbek, Urdu, Armenian, Igbo, Sindhi, Sinhala, Croatian, Icelandic, Cherokee, Galician, Catalan, Afrikaans, Kannada, Luxembourgish, Hindi, Gujarati, Kyrgyz, Kazakh, Turkmen, K'iche', Kinyarwanda, Tajik, Serbian, Odia, Welsh, Konkani, Bangla, Nepali, Basque, Hebrew, Latvian, Tigrinya, Slovak, Slovenian, Swahili, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Georgian, Maori, Wolof, Bosnian, Persian, Telugu, Tamil, Irish, Estonian, Valencian, Belarusian, Quechua, Zulu, Xhosa, Lithuanian, Sotho, Sorani, Yoruba, Uyghur, Scots, Tswana, Filipino, Mongolian, Hausa, Dari, Azerbaijani, Amharic, Albanian, Assamese, Tatar, Macedonian, Marathi, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Khmer
